      • getStockHistory

        public java.util.Map<java.util.Date,java.lang.Double> getStockHistory(UserHolding userHolding,
                                                                      double userCurrencyModifier)
                                                               throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                                                      java.text.ParseException,
                                                                      InvalidHoldingException
        Fetches, parses and returns the history of a stock
        Parameters:
        userHolding - The UserHolding to fetch, uses List of Transactions to accurately generate data
        userCurrencyModifier - The current exchange rate between the User currency and USD as AlphaVantage only offers USD data
        Returns:
        A Map of Stock history with the key of Dates rounded to the nearest instance of 0:00am with their total value for that date as a boxed Double
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        java.text.ParseException
        InvalidHoldingException

        Parameters:
        queue - The queue to be searched
        Returns:
        The Transaction Queue after passing any 0 quantity Transactions

                                                                throws InvalidHoldingException

        stockHistory - The stock history to populate
        earliestDateInRange - The first date in the StockHistory requested to be returned

        InvalidHoldingException
